name: 4 Day Salkantay Trek And Huayna Picchu Climb
description: This trek is the shorter version of Salkantay to Machu Picchu. It is an optimal trek for those with less time in Cusco still wish to experience the amazing scenery offered on the Salkantay trek. Salkantay, meaning: "The Savage", is the second largest mountain in the Cusco region. On this trek, you will enjoy an adventure of a lifetime.
